about_the_game:
The Spooky Party pack includes Ghost Mode and new Graveyard level theme.

In Ghost Mode you have the ability to go invisible and hide, yet you can only chomp when you are visible. An exciting mode that adds stealth and sneaking, hide and seek, to the classic chomp and chase, adding whole new layers of strategy.

There are 4 new levels in a Graveyard with a SPOOKY mist for all your halloweenie games! Plus infinite spooky levels with the level generator.
detailed_description:
The Spooky Party pack includes Ghost Mode and new Graveyard level theme.

In Ghost Mode you have the ability to go invisible and hide, yet you can only chomp when you are visible. An exciting mode that adds stealth and sneaking, hide and seek, to the classic chomp and chase, adding whole new layers of strategy.

There are 4 new levels in a Graveyard with a SPOOKY mist for all your halloweenie games! Plus infinite spooky levels with the level generator.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
